verses.kjv: And if his oblation be a sacrifice of peace offering, if he offer it of the herd; whether it be a male or female, he shall offer it without blemish before the LORD.
verses.web: “ ‘If his offering is a sacrifice of peace offerings, if he offers it from the herd, whether male or female, he shall offer it without defect before LORD.
verses.ct: "If someone's offering is a peace offering and they bring it from the herd, it may be either male or female, but it must be an animal without any defect, presented before the LORD.

verses.kjv: And he shall lay his hand upon the head of his offering, and kill it at the door of the tabernacle of the congregation: and Aaron’s sons the priests shall sprinkle the blood upon the altar round about.
verses.web: He shall lay his hand on the head of his offering, and kill it at the door of the Tent of Meeting. Aaron’s sons, the priests, shall sprinkle the blood around on the altar.
verses.ct: The person must place their hand on the head of the animal and slaughter it at the entrance of the tabernacle. Then Aaron's sons, the priests, will sprinkle the blood all around the altar.

verses.kjv: And he shall offer of the sacrifice of the peace offering an offering made by fire unto the LORD; the fat that covereth the inwards, and all the fat that is upon the inwards,
verses.web: He shall offer of the sacrifice of peace offerings an offering made by fire to LORD. The fat that covers the innards, and all the fat that is on the innards,
verses.ct: From this peace offering, the person must present a portion as an offering made by fire to the LORD: the fat covering the internal organs, along with all the fat attached to them,

verses.kjv: And the two kidneys, and the fat that is on them, which is by the flanks, and the caul above the liver, with the kidneys, it shall he take away.
verses.web: and the two kidneys, and the fat that is on them, which is by the loins, and the cover on the liver, with the kidneys, he shall take away.
verses.ct: both kidneys with the fat around them near the loins, and the covering of the liver, which he must remove along with the kidneys.

verses.kjv: And Aaron’s sons shall burn it on the altar upon the burnt sacrifice, which is upon the wood that is on the fire: it is an offering made by fire, of a sweet savour unto the LORD.
verses.web: Aaron’s sons shall burn it on the altar on the burnt offering, which is on the wood that is on the fire: it is an offering made by fire, of a pleasant aroma to LORD.
verses.ct: Aaron's sons will then burn these portions on the altar on top of the burnt offering already lying on the burning wood. This is an offering made by fire, and its aroma is pleasing to the LORD.

verses.kjv: And if his offering for a sacrifice of peace offering unto the LORD be of the flock; male or female, he shall offer it without blemish.
verses.web: “ ‘If his offering for a sacrifice of peace offerings to LORD is from the flock, either male or female, he shall offer it without defect.
verses.ct: "If someone's peace offering to the LORD comes from the flock, it may be either male or female, but it must be an animal without any defect.

verses.kjv: If he offer a lamb for his offering, then shall he offer it before the LORD.
verses.web: If he offers a lamb for his offering, then he shall offer it before LORD;
verses.ct: If the person offers a lamb, they must present it before the LORD.

verses.kjv: And he shall lay his hand upon the head of his offering, and kill it before the tabernacle of the congregation: and Aaron’s sons shall sprinkle the blood thereof round about upon the altar.
verses.web: and he shall lay his hand on the head of his offering, and kill it before the Tent of Meeting. Aaron’s sons shall sprinkle its blood around on the altar.
verses.ct: They must place their hand on the head of the animal and slaughter it in front of the tabernacle. Then Aaron's sons will sprinkle its blood all around the altar.

verses.kjv: And he shall offer of the sacrifice of the peace offering an offering made by fire unto the LORD; the fat thereof, and the whole rump, it shall he take off hard by the backbone; and the fat that covereth the inwards, and all the fat that is upon the inwards,
verses.web: He shall offer from the sacrifice of peace offerings an offering made by fire to LORD; its fat, the entire tail fat, he shall take away close to the backbone; and the fat that covers the entrails, and all the fat that is on the entrails,
verses.ct: From this peace offering, the person must present a portion as an offering made by fire to the LORD: the fat, including the entire fat tail cut off close to the backbone, the fat covering the internal organs, and all the fat attached to them,

verses.kjv: And the two kidneys, and the fat that is upon them, which is by the flanks, and the caul above the liver, with the kidneys, it shall he take away.
verses.web: and the two kidneys, and the fat that is on them, which is by the loins, and the cover on the liver, with the kidneys, he shall take away.
verses.ct: both kidneys with the fat around them near the loins, and the covering of the liver, which he must remove along with the kidneys.

verses.kjv: And the priest shall burn it upon the altar: it is the food of the offering made by fire unto the LORD.
verses.web: The priest shall burn it on the altar: it is the food of the offering made by fire to LORD.
verses.ct: The priest will then burn all of this on the altar. It is food given as an offering made by fire to the LORD.

verses.kjv: And if his offering be a goat, then he shall offer it before the LORD.
verses.web: “ ‘If his offering is a goat, then he shall offer it before LORD.
verses.ct: "If someone's offering is a goat, they must present it before the LORD.

verses.kjv: And he shall lay his hand upon the head of it, and kill it before the tabernacle of the congregation: and the sons of Aaron shall sprinkle the blood thereof upon the altar round about.
verses.web: He shall lay his hand on its head, and kill it before the Tent of Meeting; and the sons of Aaron shall sprinkle its blood around on the altar.
verses.ct: They must place their hand on the animal's head and slaughter it in front of the tabernacle. Then Aaron's sons will sprinkle its blood all around the altar.

verses.kjv: And he shall offer thereof his offering, even an offering made by fire unto the LORD; the fat that covereth the inwards, and all the fat that is upon the inwards,
verses.web: He shall offer from it as his offering, an offering made by fire to LORD; the fat that covers the innards, and all the fat that is on the innards,
verses.ct: From this animal, the person must present their offering made by fire to the LORD: the fat covering the internal organs, along with all the fat attached to them,

verses.kjv: And the two kidneys, and the fat that is upon them, which is by the flanks, and the caul above the liver, with the kidneys, it shall he take away.
verses.web: and the two kidneys, and the fat that is on them, which is by the loins, and the cover on the liver, with the kidneys, he shall take away.
verses.ct: both kidneys with the fat around them near the loins, and the covering of the liver, which he must remove along with the kidneys.

verses.kjv: And the priest shall burn them upon the altar: it is the food of the offering made by fire for a sweet savour: all the fat is the LORD’s.
verses.web: The priest shall burn them on the altar: it is the food of the offering made by fire, for a pleasant aroma; all the fat is LORD’s.
verses.ct: The priest will burn all of these portions on the altar. They are food given as an offering made by fire, and their aroma is pleasing to the LORD. All the fat belongs to the LORD.

verses.kjv: It shall be a perpetual statute for your generations throughout all your dwellings, that ye eat neither fat nor blood.
verses.web: “ ‘It shall be a perpetual statute throughout your generations in all your dwellings, that you shall eat neither fat nor blood.’ ”
verses.ct: "This is a permanent rule for all your generations, wherever you live: you must never eat fat or blood."
